title: Full Stack Web Developer
description: Developed a marketing automation application using Django framework and Selenium for automating contact form submissions across multiple websites with proxy rotation for efficient web scraping.
items: Developed a marketing automation application using Django framework and Selenium for automating contact form submissions across multiple websites
Integrated Celery for scheduling and parallel task execution.
Implemented proxy rotation system to avoid IP blocking

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description: Developed and maintained various web applications using Python, PHP, JavaScript, and GoLang, working on both new and existing projects. Focused on delivering high-quality code through comprehensive testing.
items: Developed and maintained web applications with Python, PHP, JavaScript, and GoLang
Implemented unit tests and end-to-end testing suites
Fixed bugs and improved functionality in existing applications
Implemented best practices for code quality and performance

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed and maintained various web applications using Python, PHP, and JavaScript, working on both new and existing projects. Focused on delivering high-quality code through comprehensive testing.
items: Developed and maintained web applications with Python, PHP, JavaScript, and GoLang
